meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02271.8, with the rightmost '8' indicating the tenths place based on the rule 'The rightmost white wheel (black digits) shows the tenths place (0.0–0.9 m³).'. The red needle points precisely to the '0.03' mark on the circular dial, indicating 0.03 m³. The '0' on the dial is assumed to be at 12 o'clock, so 0.03 is 3 divisions clockwise, each being 36 degrees (360/10).
